verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> mas-Kil Maschil לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; of David בִּהְיוֹת֖וֹ <WH1961> bih-yo-To was in בַמְּעָרָ֣ה <WH4631> vam-me-'a-Rah when he was in the cave תְפִלָּֽה׃ <WH8605> te-fil-Lah. A Prayer ק֭וֹלִי <WH6963> Ko-li with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֶזְעָ֑ק <WH2199> 'ez-'Ak; I cried ק֝וֹלִ֗י <WH6963> ko-Li, with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <WH2603> 'et-chan-Nan. did I make my supplication

אֶשְׁפֹּ֣ךְ <WH8210> 'esh-Poch I poured out לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> si-Chi; my complaint צָ֝רָתִ֗י <WH6869> tza-ra-Ti, him my trouble לְפָנָ֥יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before אַגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> 'ag-Gid. him I shewed

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֬ף <WH5848> be-hit-'at-Tef was overwhelmed עָלַ֨י׀ <WH5921> 'a-Lai within רוּחִ֗י <WH7307> ru-Chi, When my spirit וְאַתָּה֮ <WH859> ve-'at-Tah You יָדַ֪עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta within me then thou knewest נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י <WH5410> ne-ti-Va-Ti my path בְּאֹֽרַח־ <WH734> be-'o-rach- In the way ז֥וּ <WH2098> zu wherein אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ <WH1980> 'a-hal-Lech; I walked טָמְנ֖וּ <WH2934> ta-me-Nu have they privily laid פַ֣ח <WH6341> fach a snare לִֽי׃ Li.

הַבֵּ֤יט <WH5027> hab-Beit I looked יָמִ֨ין׀ <WH3225> ya-Min on [my] right hand וּרְאֵה֮ <WH7200> u-re-'Eh and beheld וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> ve-'ein- there לִ֪י li מַ֫כִּ֥יר <WH5234> mak-Kir but [there was] no man that would know אָבַ֣ד <WH6> 'a-Vad failed מָנ֣וֹס <WH4498> ma-Nos me refuge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni; at אֵ֖ין <WH369> 'ein is no דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> do-Resh me no man cared לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> le-naf-Shi. for my soul

זָעַ֥קְתִּי <WH2199> za-'Ak-ti I cried אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha, to יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto thee O LORD אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> 'A-mar-ti I said אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You מַחְסִ֑י <WH4268> mach-Si; Thou [art] my refuge חֶ֝לְקִ֗י <WH2506> chel-Ki, [and] my portion בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land הַֽחַיִּים׃ <WH2416> Ha-chai-yim. of the living

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ <WH7181> hak-Shi-vah Attend אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to רִנָּתִי֮ <WH7440> rin-na-Ti unto my cry כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For דַלּ֪וֹתִ֫י <WH1809> dal-Lo-Ti low מְאֹ֥ד <WH3966> me-'Od very הַצִּילֵ֥נִי <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni deliver מֵרֹדְפַ֑י <WH7291> me-ro-de-Fai; me from my persecutors כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for אָמְצ֣וּ <WH553> 'a-me-Tzu for they are stronger מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. are too

ה֘וֹצִ֤יאָה <WH3318> ho-Tzi-'ah Bring מִמַּסְגֵּ֨ר׀ <WH4525> mi-mas-Ger out of prison נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul לְהוֹד֪וֹת <WH3034> le-ho-Dot that I may praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁ֫מֶ֥ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha thy name בִּ֭י bi יַכְתִּ֣רוּ <WH3803> yach-Ti-ru shall compass me about צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim; the righteous כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for תִגְמֹ֣ל <WH1580> tig-Mol for thou shalt deal bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. and
